Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.commandmessage

Contains classes used to represent the command messages
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggregateActionCommandMessage
    This class wraps an instance of AggregateActionID during transfer from server to client.
    ColorCommandMessage
    This class wraps an instance of Color during transfer from server to client.
    CommandMessage
    A command message is a subset of the command that contains only the necessary information for its display to the clients
    EffectCommandMessage
    This class represents a command containing a weapon's effect.
    PlayerCommandMessage
    This class wraps an instance of PlayerId during transfer from server to client.
    PowerUpCommandMessage
    This class wraps an instance of PowerUpID during transfer from server to client.
    ShootCommandMessage
    This class wraps an list of of EffectCommandMessage during transfer from server to client.
    SimpleCommandMessage
    This class wraps a command message without any attachment.
    SquareCommandMessage
    This class wraps a square's coordinates during transfer from server to client.
    WeaponCommandMessage
    This class wraps a string containing the name of a weapon during transfer from server to client.
    WeaponModeCommandMessage
    This class wraps a string containing the name of a weapon mode during transfer from server to client.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandType
    Contains all possible type of command message that server can send to client.
